description:
If you have a nova-baremetal managed server, and you issue a nova rebuild, it will reboot and write a new image onto the instance.

However, if that fails, nova-baremetal wipes away the reference to the instance_uuid, which means you cannot fix the machine out of band.

This is particularly problematic if using the 'preserve_ephemeral' capability of rebuild, as a failed rebuild may result in a loss sof the ephemeral disk.
title: nova-baremetal loses track of instance<->node relationship on REBUILD error
